reviews.text: It's a nice little station with a shelter and a bin.

A decent, minor stop. It’s next to a level crossing in a village where the local drivers still seem to be surprised by it, so careful entering and leaving. Unmanned with no buildings or toilets. Just a small shelter and a ticket machine. But it’s still quicker, cheaper, more comfortable, more reliable and more convenient to catch a train from here to Bridgend or Cardiff than it is to catch a bus.
Small unmanned station with ticket machine that only limited trains stop at, there is also a park and ride behind the station that is free to leave your car whilst travelling on the train.
A train station with a level crossing on the main line but not all trains stop here.
Small station with a shelter on each platform and ticket machines.
